All Classes

Class Description
AvailableCryptoList  
ChartData
class that stores chart data and formats the data for the trade log table utilizes the Singleton design pattern
CheckCoinsListFacade
This class checks if the entered coins match the needed coins for a strategy
CryptoCoins
Class that stores the cryptocoins that the user is allowed to use as well as the ones that have been inputted Used as a Facade to get the prices of entered coins using the DataFetcher from the CoinGecko API
DataFetcher
class that fetches prices for cryptocoins from the CoinGecko API adapted from code given in the cs2212 class for the trader project
DataVisualizationCreator
This class creates the objects that will display the trade log table and strategies used histogram on the mainUI This code was adapted from code provided by CS2212
Factory
This class takes in a broker and returns the an object of type TradingStrategy based on what strategy the broker want to use Implements the factory design pattern
initiateSession
Initiate Session interface used to: - create a session to run the mainUI once the user's credentials are valid.
LoginProxy
This proxy keeps a reference to the LoginServece class it also controls access to it.
LoginServer
This is LoginServer class where the login-ui sets.
LoginSubject
This class specifies a common interface for LoginProxy and LoginServer class.
MainApp
This is the main class where we run the whole app.
MainUI
CS 2212 Project The MainUI class represents the main window of the cryptoTrader program.
TradeResult
Class that stores the result from the trades.
TradingBroker
Class that creates trading brokers Each broker is unique and can make many trades using varying strategies
TradingStrategy
Interface for Trading Strategy classes
TradingStrategyA
defines TradingStrategyA
TradingStrategyB
defines TradingStrategyB
TradingStrategyC
defines TradingStrategyC
TradingStrategyD
defines TradingStrategyD
TradingStrategyE
defines TradingStrategyE
UserSelections
UserSelections class stores all the information in one line of the input table on the MainUI This includes broker name, coins of interest, and trading strategy Getters and Setters are defined for instance variables
validateUser
The validateUser interface used to validate user's credentials.
